thread.title: Canucks send early message with win over Flames
thread.title_full: Canucks send early message with win over Flames

author: ERIC DUHATSCHEK
title: Canucks send early message with win over Flames
text:
Flames goalie Karri Ramo watches as Daniel Sedin of the Vancouver Canucks scores a second-period goal Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. (Sergei Belski/USA Today Sports) NHL Canucks 5, Flames 1 Canucks send early message with win over Flames ERIC DUHATSCHEK CALGARY — The Globe and Mail 
Published Thursday, Oct. 08, 2015 1:14AM EDT 
Last updated Thursday, Oct. 08, 2015 1:16AM EDT 
Just in case anyone was wondering if the Vancouver Canucks had forgotten how last season ended, the answer came Wednesday night – and it was a resounding no. 
The Canucks returned to the scene of their first-round playoff exit – the Scotiabank Saddledome, where Micheal Ferland practically ran them out of the rink last spring – and sent a strong early message; that there’ll be more of a pushback this year when the divisional rivals meet. connect with us The Globe and Mail Newspaper
